com.topcoder.clients.dao
Interface ClientStatusDAO

All Superinterfaces:
GenericDAO<com.topcoder.clients.model.ClientStatus,java.lang.Long>
All Known Subinterfaces:
ClientStatusDAOLocal, ClientStatusDAORemote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientStatusDAOBean
public interface ClientStatusDAO
extends GenericDAO<com.topcoder.clients.model.ClientStatus,java.lang.Long>

This interface represents the ClientStatusDAO business interface.

This interface defines the specific methods available for the ClientStatusDAO business interface: get the clients with the corresponding status.

See base interface for other available operations.

THREAD SAFETY: Implementations of this interface should be thread safe.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mafy, TCSDEVELOPER

Field Detail

BEAN_NAME

static final java.lang.String BEAN_NAME

This static final String field represents the 'BEAN_NAME' property of the ClientStatusDAO business interface. Represents the EJB session bean name.

It is initialized to a default value: "ClientStatusDAOBean" String during runtime.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getClientsWithStatus

java.util.List<com.topcoder.clients.model.Client> getClientsWithStatus(com.topcoder.clients.model.ClientStatus status)
                                                                       throws EntityNotFoundException,
                                                                              DAOException

Defines the operation that performs the retrieval of the list with clients with the given status from the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.

Parameters:
status - the given client status to retrieve it's clients. Should not be null.
Returns:
the list of Clients for the given client status found in the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if status is null.
EntityNotFoundException - if status is not found in the persistence.
DAOException - if any error occurs while performing this operation.
